question:
Recently, the Government announced that it will be soon coming up with countryâ€™s first National Urban Policy Framework, which will comply with the commitments made at Habitat III conference. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. UN Conferences on Housing (Habitat) are biennial conferences
  2. The proposed National Urban Policy (NUP) aims to implement the key features of New Urban Agenda by United Nations
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because the UN Conferences on Housing (Habitat) are occurring in the bi-decennial period. First conference Habitat-I took place in 1976, Habitat-II in 1996 and Habitat-III was held in Quito, Ecuador, in October 2016. <u>Second statement is correct.</u> The proposed National Urban Policy (NUP) aims to implement the key features of New Urban Agenda endorsed by the United Nation General Assembly.
